mapper.select:
SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, D.* FROM( SELECT BM02.CLNT_DIV_CD
, T1.CO_CD , FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(T1.CO_CD) CO_NM
, T1.CLNT_CD , T1.PRDT_DIV
, FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(BM02.CLNT_DIV_CD) CLNT_DIV_NM
, FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(T1.PRDT_DIV) PRDT_DIV_NM , NVL(BM02.CLNT_NM, '기타') CLNT_NM , SUM(NVL(T1.PLAN_WT,0)) AS PLAN_WT , SUM(NVL(T1.TRST_Y,0)) AS TRST_Y , SUM(NVL(T1.TRST_N,0)) AS TRST_N , TO_CHAR(CASE WHEN SUM(NVL(T1.PLAN_WT,0)) != 0 THEN ((SUM(NVL(T1.TRST_N,0)) + SUM(NVL(T1.TRST_Y,0))) / SUM(NVL(T1.PLAN_WT,0))) * 100 ELSE 0 END, '9,999.99') AS TRST_RATE
,T1.PLAN_SALES_ID ,T1.PLAN_SALES_NM
,T1.PLAN_DEPT_ID
, T1.PLAN_DEPT_NM
FROM (
SELECT '1' type1 , S.PLAN_SEQ , S.CO_CD , S.CLNT_CD , TRIM(S.PRDT_DIV) PRDT_DIV
, S.PLAN_YM
,S.PLAN_SALES_ID , CM06.NAME AS PLAN_SALES_NM
,S.PAN_DEPT_ID AS PLAN_DEPT_ID
,CM04.DEPT_NM AS PLAN_DEPT_NM
, SUM(S.PLAN_WT) PLAN_WT , 0 TRST_Y , 0 TRST_N FROM TB_SD01M01 S LEFT JOIN TB_CM06M01 CM06 ON CM06.ID = S.PLAN_SALES_ID LEFT JOIN TB_CM04M01 CM04 ON CM04.DEPT_ID = CM06.DEPT_ID WHERE 1=1
AND S.CO_CD = #{coCd}
AND S.PLAN_YM = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{planYm},'YYYY-MM'),'YYYYMM')
AND S.PLAN_SALES_ID = #{planSalesId}
AND CM06.NAME LIKE '%'||#{planSalesNm} || '%'
AND S.PAN_DEPT_ID IN (SELECT DEPT_ID FROM ( SELECT LEVEL LV, A.* FROM TB_CM04M01 A WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' START WITH DEPT_ID = #{planDeptId} CONNECT BY PRIOR DEPT_ID = UP_DEPT_ID ORDER SIBLINGS BY SORT_NO ) B)
AND CM04.DEPT_NM IN (SELECT DEPT_NM FROM ( SELECT LEVEL LV, A.* FROM TB_CM04M01 A WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' START WITH DEPT_NM like '%'||#{planDeptNm}||'%' CONNECT BY PRIOR DEPT_ID = UP_DEPT_ID ORDER SIBLINGS BY SORT_NO ) B)
AND S.PRDT_GRP = #{prdtGrp}
AND S.PRDT_DIV = #{prdtDiv}
AND ( S.SELPCH_CD = #{selpchCd} OR SELPCH_CD = 'SELPCH3' )
AND ( S.SELPCH_CD = #{selpchCd} OR SELPCH_CD = 'SELPCH4' )
GROUP BY S.PLAN_SEQ , S.CO_CD , S.CLNT_CD , TRIM(S.PRDT_DIV)
, S.PLAN_YM
, S.PLAN_SALES_ID , CM06.NAME
,S.PAN_DEPT_ID
,CM04.DEPT_NM
UNION ALL SELECT '2' type1 , 0 AS PLAN_SEQ , AR02.CO_CD , AR02.TRST_CLNT_CD , TRIM(AR02.PRDT_DIV) PRDT_DIV
, SUBSTRING(AR02.TRST_DT, 0, 6) TRST_DT
, AR02.SALES_MNG , CM06.NAME
, CM06.DEPT_ID
,CM04.DEPT_NM
, 0 AS PLAN_WT , SUM(DECODE(AR02.IMP_YN, 'Y', AR02.REAL_TRST_WT)) TRST_Y , SUM(DECODE(AR02.IMP_YN, 'N', AR02.REAL_TRST_WT)) TRST_N FROM TB_AR02M01 AR02 INNER JOIN TB_BM01M01 BM01 ON BM01.PRDT_CD = AR02.TRST_PRDT_CD LEFT JOIN TB_CM06M01 CM06 ON CM06.ID = AR02.SALES_MNG LEFT JOIN TB_CM04M01 CM04 ON CM04.DEPT_ID = CM06.DEPT_ID WHERE 1=1
AND AR02.CO_CD = #{coCd}
AND SUBSTRING(AR02.TRST_DT, 0, 6) = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{planYm},'YYYY-MM'),'YYYYMM')
AND ( AR02.SELPCH_CD = #{selpchCd} OR AR02.SELPCH_CD = 'SELPCH3' )
AND ( AR02.SELPCH_CD = #{selpchCd} OR AR02.SELPCH_CD = 'SELPCH4' )
AND AR02.SALES_MNG = #{planSalesId}
AND CM06.NAME LIKE '%'||#{planSalesNm} || '%'
AND BM01.PRDT_GRP = #{prdtGrp}
AND BM01.PRDT_DIV = #{prdtDiv}
AND CM06.DEPT_ID IN (SELECT DEPT_ID FROM ( SELECT LEVEL LV, A.* FROM TB_CM04M01 A WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' START WITH DEPT_ID = #{planDeptId} CONNECT BY PRIOR DEPT_ID = UP_DEPT_ID ORDER SIBLINGS BY SORT_NO ) B)
AND CM04.DEPT_NM IN (SELECT DEPT_NM FROM ( SELECT LEVEL LV, A.* FROM TB_CM04M01 A WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' START WITH DEPT_NM like '%'||#{planDeptNm}||'%' CONNECT BY PRIOR DEPT_ID = UP_DEPT_ID ORDER SIBLINGS BY SORT_NO ) B)
AND AR02.TAXIVC_COPRT = #{taxivcCoprt}
GROUP BY AR02.CO_CD, AR02.TRST_CLNT_CD, TRIM(AR02.PRDT_DIV)
, SUBSTRING(AR02.TRST_DT, 0, 6)
, AR02.SALES_MNG , CM06.NAME
, CM06.DEPT_ID
, CM04.DEPT_NM
) T1 LEFT JOIN TB_BM02M01 BM02 ON BM02.CLNT_CD = T1.CLNT_CD GROUP BY BM02.CLNT_DIV_CD
, T1.CO_CD
, T1.CLNT_CD , T1.PRDT_DIV
, NVL(BM02.CLNT_NM, '기타')
,T1.PLAN_SALES_ID ,T1.PLAN_SALES_NM
,T1.PLAN_DEPT_ID
, T1.PLAN_DEPT_NM
ORDER BY
T1.PLAN_DEPT_NM ,
T1.PLAN_SALES_ID, T1.PLAN_SALES_NM,
T1.CO_CD,
BM02.CLNT_DIV_CD,
T1.PRDT_DIV, T1.CLNT_CD ) D
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_SD01M01 SET CLNT_CD = #{clntCd}, SALES_AREA_CD = #{selesAreaCd}, PRDT_GRP = #{prdtGrp}, PRDT_DIV = #{prdtDiv}, PRDT_STKN = #{prdtStkn}, PLAN_WT = #{planWt}, PAN_DEPT_ID = #{panDeptId}, PLAN_SALES_ID = #{planSalesId}, RMK = #{rmk}, UDT_ID = #{userId}, UDT_PGM = #{pgmId}, UDT_DTTM = SYSDATE WHERE PLAN_SEQ = #{planSeq}
